DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether chronic dose Niaspan™ increase reverse cholesterol transport , high-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( HDL-C ) level , fecal excretion cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Niaspan™ High-density Lipoprotein ( HDL ) Healthy Male Subjects ( 0000-069 )
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male Subjects Exclusion Criteria : Subject history stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disorder Subject history clinically significant endocrine , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hematological , hepatic , immunological , renal , respiratory , genitourinary abnormality disease
